name: Mortified
storyline: You are a private investigator who must intervene on several macabre places or atrocious murders have occurred but everything will not go as planned , You are facing an entity whose existence you would never have discovered your goal is to make a ritual that will allow the demonic creature to disappear from this world! And above all, never turn back!
summary: Mortified is multiplayer horror co-op game playing 1-8 players find all the objects to make disappear the creature that wants to kill everything it sees ! Weclome to the hell .
